q2.question: Do I need to pay for Binance API?
q2.answer: No! Binance API is free. You just need to create your API keys in your Binance account settings and add them to NOTTIFY.

q3.question: Is it safe to connect my Binance account?
q3.answer: Yes! We use end-to-end encryption and you can configure API permissions for read-only or limited trading permissions.

q4.question: Can I cancel anytime?
q4.answer: Yes! There's no commitment. You can cancel your subscription at any time and will continue to have access until the end of the paid period.

cta.title: Ready to Protect Your Account?
